data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I wish I were more successful in my studies. I ____ been ____ to ____ my ____, ____ I ____ should ____ more ____ practicing ____ I ____ do. Whenever I try ____ apply ____, I get ____ and ____ to ____ my ____. If it wasn't so boring I would likely study more frequently.
data.partBlankContent: I wish I were more successful in my studies. I ha__ been attem_____ to imp____ my ski___, b__ I prob____ should sp___ more ti__ practicing th__ I actu____ do. Whenever I try t_ apply mys___, I get distr_____ and fa__ to fin___ my wo__. If it wasn't so boring I would likely study more frequently.
data.answer: 我希望我在学习上更成功。我一直在努力提高我的技能，但我可能应该花更多的时间来练习。每当我努力工作时，我就会分心，无法完成工作。如果不是那么无聊，我可能会更频繁地学习。
